short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to summarize the text !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple tool to extract the summary out of a long content based document from the web with ease. It generates the summary for the text that you pass through the form and you can aslo set the length of the summary by using the slider. By default it set to 30%. 

How to use?

1) Visit the page that you want to summarize. 
2) Select the text.
3) Click the Extension Icon.
4) Paste the selected text into the textarea provided.
5) Set the slider to your desired length of the summary.
6) Submit the form by clicking on the "Summary" button.


Note:-
1) Summary cannot be less than 20% and more than 80%.
2) You need to select the text for summary of atleast 2 long paragraphs.
